<S%H518>"If<s%> we <S%H559>say,<s%> 'We will <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%>' then the <S%H7458>famine<s%> is in the <S%H5892>city<s%> and we shall <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> we <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H6311>here,<s%> we <S%H4191>die<s%> also. <S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H1980>come,<s%> and let us <S%H5307>go<s%> <S%H5307>over<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H758>Arameans.<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> they <S%H2421>spare<s%> us, we shall <S%H2421>live;<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> they <S%H4191>kill<s%> us, we shall but <S%H4191>die.<s%>"
